Header.title: Welcome to StockCompare.in
Header.paragraph: Make better personal finance decisions with our tools and articles!
Why: Find more stocks that perform like the one you choose (StockSimilar)
Regular articles and opinions on finance concepts, and financial news on our blog
We are building StockComparer to be a lot more than just this, so stick around!
Feel free to give us some feedback/suggest more features

About.paragraph: We are just two young finance enthusiasts who realised that finding stocks that move like the well-known, expensive ones can be a great way to find good stocks.There was no good tool that let us do it, and hence Stockcompare.in was born! We also have a blog, that regularly captures our take on finance topics, stock market news and personal finance. We are always working towards making Stockcompare.in more than what it is and would love to have your support and learn from you!

Services.name: StockComparer
Services.text: Allows you to view the charts of any two stocks on a single plot

Services.name: StockSimilar
Services.text: Shows all the stocks that have moved similarly to a chosen stock
